Name: Nerya
Appearance:
Nerya is a serious-looking woman with long 
dark blue hair tied into a thick braid.
Strengths: Great magic resistance

Name: Thalwen
Appearance:
A gaunt, elderly sea warlock with blue-tinted skin and 
a long, tangled gray beard. He wears tattered 
seaweed-like robes adorned with shells, 
bones, and charms tied at his belt
Strengths: Can weaken enemies with curses

Name: Tynira
Appearance:
A quirky young woman with messy short hair
 held back by a metal clip. 
She wears round goggles often smudged 
with soot, a worn leather apron 
over simple work clothes, and heavy gloves. 
A tool belt filled with bolts, 
coils, and screwdrivers hangs at her waist.
 She wields an
 electrified wrench that occasionally spits sparks.
Strengths:
Provides small, random buffs
 (attack, defense, speed).

Can slightly restore allies’ energy with 
her gadgets.
Reliable as an early-game support.

Name: Nora
Appearance:
Young waterborne marksman with short, 
tousled aqua-blue hair and sharp, focused blue eyes
Strengths: Long-range water-based attacks

Name: Halvar
Appearance:
Halvar is a rugged warrior with short grey-green hair and 
a trimmed beard. He wears heavy armor composed of dull 
bronze metal and dark green leather
Strengths: Solid physical defense for a common rarity

Name: Zeyra
Appearance:
A lean, agile young woman with spiky golden 
hair tied in a short ponytail and sharp cyan eyes
Strengths: Fast melee strikes

Name: Brakka
Appearance:
A broad-shouldered, stocky woman clad in heavy, 
scorched iron armor trimmed with gold.
and her face bears an old burn scar beneath a 
battered helmet. She wields a large rectangular 
shield and a worn furnace hammer
Strengths: High physical and fire resistance

Name: Korran
Appearance:
A disciplined sentinel clad in heavy, blackened armor, 
its surface scorched and cracked with glowing embers
 seeping through the seams. He carries a massive rectangular 
shield engraved with fiery runes, its edges 
glowing as if freshly forged.
Strengths:
Excellent defense against physical attacks.
Shield skills allow him to block 
and reduce incoming damage.
Aura of heated metal weakens 
enemies’ weapons over time.
Weaknesses:
Struggles
 against
 magical or
 piercing attacks.

Name: Sylvara
Appearance:
A sleek and elegant harpy with a humanoid face, 
sharp features, and piercing yellow eyes.
Strengths:
Fast ranged attacks with 
wind-charged javelins.

Name: Elyndra
Appearance: Eryndra is a graceful bard touched by the essence of the wind
Strengths: Can reduce enemy accuracy

Name: Liora
Appearance:
Liora is a graceful archer 
with long flowing platinum 
hair and sharp golden eyes
Strengths: Strong long-range attacks, fast linear DPS

Name: Ignara
Appearance:
Long fiery red hair, 
asymmetrical crimson & gold robe with 
tattered sleeves, 
floating grimoire with glowing runes.
Strengths:
High single-target damage, 
persistent burn, synergy with tanks
Weaknesses:
Fragile, vulnerable
 to melee and CC

Name: Nereida
Appearance:
Long flowing teal hair, 
elegant blue and white gown, 
floating water orbs around her.
Strengths: Heals allies, buffs, water-based effects

Name: Lyaria
Appearance:
Blonde hair, white and gold robes, 
staff topped with glowing crystal.
Strengths: Buffs allies, heals over time

Name: Albert
Appearance:
A steampunk-fantasy inventor, dressed in a leather apron 
scorched with burn marks and reinforced gloves. 
He wears goggles with red-orange lenses and
 has messy, spiky hair
Strengths: Devastating AoE fire damage
Weaknesses:
If the turret 
is destroyed
, his DPS
 drops sharply.

Name: Kaelen
Appearance:
Short silver hair, 
green armored tunic, dual swords.
Strengths: Fast melee attacks, combo skills

Name: Abomys
Appearance:
Abomys is a wiry, shadow-born assassin with a lean, 
predatory body 
covered in a dark, almost obsidian skin tone.
 Her hair bursts out in jagged, wild spikes
 of black and violet hues, giving her a chaotic silhouette.
 His grin reveals sharp, 
unsettling teeth, radiating malice.
Strengths: Extremely high burst

Name: Vayna
Appearance:
Vayna is a graceful yet dangerous figure, blending the allure
 of a dancer with the menace of a pirate and the 
mystique of the abyss. Her long wavy hair flows 
like water, adorned with golden trinkets and shells
Strengths:
High single-target burst damage.
Passive lifesteal on critical strikes.
Weaknesses:
Fragile and
 vulnerable 
to crowd 
control.

Name: Chorath
Appearance:
Nightmarish wraith-like figure with an elongated,
 faceless head and hollow black eyes. His body is gaunt, with
 twisted limbs and long clawed fingers. Dark, 
tattered shadows drift from his back like torn cloth, 
giving him a ghostly silhouette
Strengths:
Debuff Specialist: The toll of his bell 
weakens enemy defenses and attack power.

AoE Support: His aura reduces enemy morale 
while strengthening nearby allies’ resistances.

Fear Mechanic: Can occasionally cause 
enemies to panic, interrupting their skills.

Name: Grathul
Appearance:
A towering beast of molten flesh and blackened stone,
 wrapped in heavy runic 
chains that glow with scorching heat. The chains constantly 
shift and rattle as if alive, radiating 
embers with every movement.
Strengths:
Can immobilize
Aura of fire damages nearby 
enemies over time.
Gains resilience the longer
 he remains in combat.
Weaknesses:
Very slow
Chains have
 limited range,
 vulnerable to 
ranged units.

Name: Raiken
Appearance:
A muscular, bare-chested fighter with glowing lightning
 tattoos across his arms and torso. 
His fists are wrapped in reinforced metal gauntlets that
 crackle with sparks. 
He wears black combat pants with a yellow belt, and 
short boots designed for agility. 
His spiky hair stands up as if charged by 
static electricity. 
His stance is wide and aggressive, 
ready to unleash rapid punches.
Strengths:
Extremely fast melee combos
Each strike builds up more 
electrical damage
Excellent burst damage in 
short engagements
Weaknesses:
Fragile compared 
to other 
melee fighters

Name: Milia
Appearance:
Milia wears a deep navy-blue reinforced 
armor with glowing electric lines running across 
its plating. Her silhouette is elegant yet sturdy. She fights from a 
distance by throwing a light, electrified hammer that acts as her 
focus. Her long black hair is tied in a high ponytail
Strengths:
High HP and resistance for a support unit 
Regular defensive buffs for allies 
Can attack from range 
while fulfilling a support role 
Great synergy with melee frontline units
Weaknesses:
Buffs are less potent
Vulnerable to magic

Name: Zephyra
Appearance:
Zephyra is an epic wind archer with long 
flowing blonde hair and piercing green eyes. 
She wears elegant emerald armor with leaf-like motifs, 
blending agility and elegance. 
Her massive dark green bow channels swirling wind energy
Strengths:
Excellent long-range burst damage. 
Can reposition quickly with wind 
dashes. 
High crit rate and evasion.
Weaknesses:
Relies on 
movement to 
survive. 
Weak to fast 
melee pressure.

Name: Seliora
Appearance:
Dark purple hair, black cloak with red accents, 
floating daggers orbiting her.
Strengths: High ranged damage, debuffs enemies

Name: Thalrik
Appearance:
Muscular build, armored in yellow & silver, 
wielding massive hammer.
Strengths: Absorbs damage, stuns enemies

Name: Drogath
Appearance:
Towering skeletal warrior, 
black bone armor with violet runes, 
massive halberd and bone shield.
Strengths:
Immense durability, life-drain, 
disrupts enemy formations

Name: Aureon
Appearance:
Aureon is an imposing warrior 
clad in massive golden 
and white armor adorned with
 intricate solar runes. His left hand wields a 
giant sun-shaped shield, while his 
right grips a long, gleaming spear.
Strengths:
Exceptional damage absorption. 
Partial immunity to debuffs. 
Aura boosts defense and attack 
of nearby allies.
Weaknesses:
Limited mobility. 
Slow movement 
and attack speed.

Name: Veyron
Appearance:
Tall warrior with long silver-white 
hair tied by a leaf-like ornament, 
clad in elegant green and silver armor with 
angular patterns. Carries two curved swords.
Strengths:
Extremely fast melee combos, 
high single-target burst, 
strong mobility and repositioning tools
Weaknesses:
Low defense, 
vulnerable to 
ranged pressure 
and crowd control

Name: Pyra
Appearance:
Pyrrha is a tall, elegant woman with long dark red 
hair tied in a high flaming ponytail. 
She wears a red and black asymmetrical battle 
robe with glowing ember accents and flame motifs
Strengths:
Provides powerful buffs 
and healing over time. 
Enhances fire-element allies. 
Can mitigate damage 
with shield effects. 
Synergizes well in sustained fights
Weaknesses:
Limited 
self-defense. 
Vulnerable to burst 
damage and 
silence effects

Name: Kaelis
Appearance:
Kaelis is a feline-featured warrior with cerulean-blue skin, 
sharp ocean-colored eyes, and tousled aqua hair. His 
muscular upper body is bare, wrapped with battle-worn 
bandages around his forearms.
Strengths:
High agility and sustained 
melee damage.
Resistant to crowd control via 
passive fluid-like movement.
Gains power the longer he 
remains in combat.
Weaknesses:
Low range and 
vulnerable to 
burst.

Name: Voltrion
Appearance:
Voltrion is a sharp-eyed, lean male mage with wild silver hair 
swept back. He wears a long, asymmetrical black and gold 
coat adorned with stylized lightning motifs.
Strengths:
Powerful burst damage at range
Electric attacks pierce through 
shields or barriers
High synergy with energy-based 
units or debuffers

Name: Saryel
Strengths:
Extremely fast melee combos, 
high aoe dmgs with dots
fast and strong mobility
Weaknesses:
Vunerable to cc
and dot purifying

Name: Nyxara
Appearance:
A tall, seductive sorceress with long silver hair
Her form-fitting outfit blends 
arcane elegance and sensual design: 
a deep-cut corset, high boots etched with violet runes, 
and a cloak with shadow motifs. 
She holds a closed grimoire marked with a summoning seal.
Strengths:
Specializes in summoning autonomous 
shadow creatures to harass 
and distract enemies.
Weaknesses:
Ineffective in 
short fights 
or high-burst 
metas

Name: Solayne
Appearance:
Solayne is a tall, graceful desert sorceress 
radiating wisdom and divine elegance.
Long, flowing platinum blonde, shimmering 
faintly like sunlight on sand.
Eyes: Golden, glowing with radiant energy.
Weapon: A slender golden staff crowned with a glowing 
sunstone crystal, radiating constant solar energy.

Name: Voltragar
Appearance:
A colossal mechanical golem forged from dark steel and
 silver plates, pulsing with glowing blue and yellow circuits
Personality:
Cold, unyielding, and built
 for protection
Strengths:
Can taunt enemies and generate 
electric shields for allies
Titanic defense and HP
